title: Moonbeams
description: A Veil Recipe3 clueless college students1 magical dimension1 Warrior PrincessA pinch of dangerTake three clueless college students, mix in a tobacco field. Combine one magical dimension and stir in a defiant Warrior Princess. Throw in a pinch of danger and slow cook until steaming.Invite five angry deities. Open and serve your new heap of trouble.
author: Lakisha Spletzer
